p: Principal investigator: JP-E. Study design and drafting of manuscript: PG-I and JP-E. Preparation of questionnaires: PG-I, JP-E, and BP-C. Creation of web page and tables: PG-I. Coordination: JP-E, DE, JL, and NG-G. Database: PG-I, TM, AV-C, and VG. Data analysis: PG-I, JP-E, and JAM-G. Analysis of results: PG-I, JP-E, NG-G, JAM-G, and JM-G. Revision of manuscript: all authors.
